actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain land located in Nye County, Nevada.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by donation a specified parcel of land (including improvements to such land) in Nye County, Nevada, for use for the development, operation, and maintenance of administrative and visitor facilities for Death Valley National Park.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain land located in Nye County, Nevada.
